paragraphs.text: Fire Lord Ozai is the tyrannical leader of the Fire Nation. He is the father of Zuko and Azula. He banished his son for speaking out of turn in a war planning session, with the condition that he may return if the Avatar was captured.

paragraphs.body: Ozai also does not have long hair or a beard as he did in the show, but instead has a simple crew cut. However, a family portrait (the one held by Zuko before his firebending training) implied that he did have long hair and a beard when he was younger, only to shave it off after he took over as Fire Lord from Azulon. His sideburns are more prominent than the film Zhao, which animated Ozai also did not have.

paragraphs.body: In the series, Ozai wears a simple red, burgundy, and gold robe, yet in the film, Ozai wears a fancy crimson colored robe with a gold, red, and black chestplate and a long black and gold cape. Cliff Curtis said in an interview that the costume was "sort of like a cross between Roman and kind of Greek, [a] gold, Roman and Greek military/samurai military [uniform]."
